body_html:
Sherry,
I haven't tried everything you said, but I do find the cause is the model file path in checkpint file is incorrect.
Here I attach my training script to and evaluation script , as you can see from cnn_train.py, even the FLAGS.train_dir is already defined, it's excluded for some reason
For a older version I use (till Jan 5), the checkpoint file look like:
model_checkpoint_path: "./train/model.ckpt-XXX"
all_model_checkpoint_paths: "./train/model.ckpt-XXX"
With Yesterday's version (till Jan 11), the checkpoint file look like:
model_checkpoint_path: "model.ckpt-XXX"
all_model_checkpoint_paths: "model.ckpt-XXX"
cnn_eval_train.zip

body:
Sherry,
I haven't tried everything you said, but I do find the cause is the model file path in checkpint file is incorrect. 
Here I attach my training script to and evaluation script , as you can see from cnn_train.py, even the FLAGS.train_dir is already defined, it's excluded for some reason
For a older version I use (till Jan 5), the checkpoint file look like:
    model_checkpoint_path: "./train/model.ckpt-XXX"
    all_model_checkpoint_paths: "./train/model.ckpt-XXX"
With Yesterday's version (till Jan 11), the checkpoint file look like:
    model_checkpoint_path: "model.ckpt-XXX"
    all_model_checkpoint_paths: "model.ckpt-XXX"
[cnn_eval_train.zip](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/88055/cnn_eval_train.zip)
